title: Recall Notification Report
summary: WASHINGTON, February 27, 2012 - London Meat Company, a New York, N.Y., establishment, is recalling approximately 200 pounds of country breakfast sausage because it contains monosodium glutamate (MSG), which is not declared on the label, the U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety and Inspection Service...

establishment.name: London Manhattan Corp.
establishment.address:
54-56 Little West 12th Street 
  New York, NY 10014

impacted_products: 5-lb boxes of "Milano's Country Breakfast Sausage," containing 80 sausage links per box.
